Ghost Sword.name: Ghost Sword
Ghost Sword.flavor: Your attack cuts through all planes of existence, ensuring that even ghostly forms suffer your wrath.
Ghost Sword.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. This damage ignores the insubstantial quality.
Ghost Sword.aegisOfAssault: When you use your aegis of assault to teleport and make an attack, you can use this power in place of the melee basic attack.

Phase Evasion.name: Phase Evasion
Phase Evasion.flavor: Your foe might have thought to get the better of you, but before its attack, you wink out and attempt to dodge the assault.
Phase Evasion.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack, and until the end of your next turn, you become insubstantial and gain phasing.

Omnipresent Assault.name: Omnipresent Assault
Omnipresent Assault.flavor: You step across dimensional boundaries, seeming to be everywhere on the battlefield at once, unleashing an attack against each foe.
Omnipresent Assault.requirement: You must be phasing or insubstantial.
Omnipresent Assault.target: Each enemy you can see when you first use the power
Omnipresent Assault.effect: Until you have attacked each eligible target once, you can teleport adjacent to a different target and repeat the attack against the new target. You then teleport back to your starting position.
